name: iPhone 16
description: Experience the future with the iPhone 16. Featuring an advanced A18 chip, improved camera system, and all-day battery life. Available in stunning new colors.

name: iPhone 16 Plus
description: Enjoy a larger display with the iPhone 16 Plus. Powered by the A18 chip, it offers enhanced performance and an impressive camera system for capturing life's moments.

name: iPhone 16 Pro
description: For professionals and enthusiasts, the iPhone 16 Pro delivers cutting-edge technology. ProMotion display, pro-grade cameras, and the powerful A18 Pro chip.

name: iPhone 16 Pro Max
description: The ultimate iPhone experience. Largest display, most advanced camera system, and the A18 Pro chip for unparalleled performance.

name: iPhone 15
description: Sleek design meets powerful performance. The iPhone 15 features an improved camera, faster A17 chip, and 5G capabilities.

name: iPhone 15 Plus
description: Bigger is better with the iPhone 15 Plus. Enjoy a larger display, long-lasting battery, and advanced dual-camera system.

name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Professional-grade camera and performance. The iPhone 15 Pro features a ProMotion display, A17 Pro chip, and a versatile triple-lens camera system.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The most powerful iPhone 15. Largest display, advanced camera capabilities, and the A17 Pro chip for unmatched performance.

name: iPhone 14
description: Reliable performance and great features. The iPhone 14 offers an excellent camera, A16 chip, and all-day battery life at a great value.

name: iPhone 14 Pro
description: Pro performance for less. Experience the Dynamic Island, always-on display, and pro-level cameras of the iPhone 14 Pro.

name: Apple Watch Series 10
description: The most advanced Apple Watch yet. Featuring health sensors, fitness tracking, and seamless integration with your iPhone.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Stay connected and healthy. The Apple Watch Series 9 offers ECG, blood oxygen monitoring, and a range of fitness features.

name: Apple Watch SE
description: Essential features at a great value. Track your fitness, stay connected, and monitor your health with the affordable Apple Watch SE.

name: AirPods 2nd Gen
description: Effortless wireless audio. Enjoy easy setup, clear sound, and long battery life with the 2nd generation AirPods.

name: AirPods Pro
description: Immersive sound experience. Active Noise Cancellation, Transparency mode, and customizable fit for premium audio.

name: iPhone 12 Mini Case
description: Protect your iPhone 12 Mini in style. Durable construction and precise fit for your compact iPhone.

name: iPhone 13 Mini Case
description: Sleek protection for your iPhone 13 Mini. Available in various colors to match your style.

name: iPhone 13 Case
description: Defend your iPhone 13 from drops and scratches. Slim design maintains your phone's elegant profile.

name: iPhone 14 Case
description: Premium protection for your iPhone 14. Precision-engineered to fit perfectly and enhance your grip.

name: iPhone 15 Case
description: Safeguard your iPhone 15 with our latest case. Offering robust protection without compromising on style or functionality.
